name: Laurel Coronet
description:
When a character uses a Skill or equips a Talent: Spend 1 less Dendro Die. (Once per Round)
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When a character uses a Skill or equips a {SPRITE_PRESET#3006}Talent:</color> Spend 1 less {SPRITE_PRESET#1107}<color=#99FF88FF>Dendro Die</color>. (Once per Round)\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When a character uses a Skill or equips a {SPRITE_PRESET#3006}Talent:</color> Spend 1 less {SPRITE_PRESET#1107}<color=#99FF88FF>Dendro Die</color>. (Once per Round)\n(A character can equip a maximum of 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact)
storytext: "There is a time appointed for all things to live and die, and the cycle continues on forever."
